data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 3, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 10, An attacking Lens player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Nice's Dante has been booked in Nice.
It's advantage Lens in Nice as Gael Kakuta scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
In the minute 12, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nice.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Nice.
In the minute 17, Lens push forward at Allianz Rivera and Clement Michelin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nice defence.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Lens's Ignatius Kpene Ganago misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 22, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Goal! Amine Gouiri levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Hassane Kamara to set up the goal.
In the minute 26, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for Lens, close to Nice's area.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 30, Lens apply pressure at Allianz Rivera and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Loic Bade but the strike hits the bar!
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Robson Bambu.
In the minute 32, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Robson Bambu (Nice) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Andy Pelmard.
Throw-in Lens.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 35, Nice's Amine Gouiri breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lens a goal kick.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lens throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 36, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Lens to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lens.
Lens drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 40, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lens throw-in in Nice's half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
At Allianz Rivera, Facundo Medina has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Lens.
Nice needs to be cautious. Lens have an attacking throw-in.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
In the minute 44, Free kick for Nice in the half of Lens.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Lens to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lens.
In the minute 45, Gael Kakuta of Lens gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nice have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Hassane Kamara (Nice) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 47, Free kick for Nice in the half of Lens.
Florian Sotoca for Lens gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 49, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Nice.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yannick Cahuzac is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
The match at Allianz Rivera has been interrupted briefly for a check on Facundo Medina, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Lens at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 56, Lens's Facundo Medina is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lens.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 61, Franck Haise is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Rivera with Corentin Jean replacing Florian Sotoca.
Simon Banza is replacing Ignatius Kpene Ganago for the away team.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 63, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Important block from the Nice defence as Clement Michelin fires in a strike for Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 65, Lens pushes forward through Loic Bade, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 67, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Nice.
The home team have replaced Kephren Thuram Ulien with Dan Ndoye. This is the second substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a third substitution, with Tony Mauricio replacing Gael Kakuta.
In the minute 69, Lens's Simon Banza gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 70, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Lens.
Ismael Boura (Lens) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Amine Gouiri.
In the minute 75, That's a fine assist from Pierre Lees-Melou.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Issiaga Sylla is on a sub for Ismael Boura for Lens.
Throw-in Nice.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nice.
In Nice Lens attack through Yannick Cahuzac. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 83, Lens have a goal kick.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Lens to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 85, Lens attack but Simon Banza's header doesn't find the target.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Nice a goal kick.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lens throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 89, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lens close to the penalty box.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Lens drives forward and Loic Bade gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nice have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
The home team replace Kasper Dolberg with Evann Guessand.
Patrick Burner is replacing Jordan Lotomba for the home team.
Nice make their fourth substitution with Eddy Sylvestre replacing Alexis Claude-Maurice.
